Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: marking as v1.1 since I don't believe the python sdk will be ready for v1.0

Action.author: markparz
Action.body: Changed to Future, since everything post v1.0 was tagged with Future.

Action.author: palash25
Action.body: Hi there, I've been wanting to get started with contributing to the Hyperledger Project. Is this issue suitable for a beginner like me? If yes then I would like to take a shot at this and if anyone can provide with any resources that might help me with documenting the python sdk that would be much appreciated. (Oh and the wiki link given in the previous comment leads to nowhere, I guess it has been deprecated.)

Action.author: hengfun
Action.body: H,i I would like to help out. Is this a good place to start?

Action.author: pandrejko
Action.body: This has definitely aged out. Python SDK is not officically release but the Python docs are available here: https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-sdk-py
